name: Just Pong (Ta1kur1)
description: So this is my recreation of the old classic game "Pong" , nothing much, but with some changes i made. You can play against a friend or against a simple AI with 3 difficulty options, you can also change the ball speed, player speed and  the number of goals required to win. So if you actually play this game please let me know what should i add/fix. :)
